_comment: Configuration template for the web-to-github-issue plugin.

github._comment: Default labels to apply to created issues. Can be overridden in the prompt.
Default assignees for created issues. Can be overridden in the prompt.

issue_template._comment: Template for the issue body.  Use placeholders like {{title}}, {{summary}}, {{url}}.
issue_template.title: Research Finding: {{title}}

web_search._comment: Settings related to web search and content extraction.
Maximum length of the summary extracted from the web page (characters).
CSS selectors to extract main content from the webpage.  Try different selectors to improve results.
Timeout for web requests in seconds.

error_handling._comment: Settings for handling errors during issue creation.
Whether to log errors to a file or console.
Optional Slack channel or email address to send error notifications to.

rate_limiting._comment: Settings to prevent exceeding GitHub API rate limits.
Maximum number of requests to GitHub API per minute.
Whether to retry requests if rate limited.

security._comment: Security configurations to protect sensitive information.
Whether to sanitize HTML content before including it in the issue body.
List of allowed domains to fetch content from.  Prevents fetching content from untrusted sources.
